content.description: Your open-source infrastructure automation platform. Manage your infrastructure as code with ease.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Manage your infrastructure projects. Each project represents a collection of stacks and resources.
projects.no_projects: No projects found. Create your first project to get started.

stacks.title: Stacks
stacks.description: Manage your infrastructure stacks. Stacks are the core unit of infrastructure management in Colonia.
stacks.no_stacks: No stacks found. Create your first stack to begin managing infrastructure.

environments.title: Environments
environments.description: Manage deployment environments for your projects. Define and organize different stages like development, staging, and production.
environments.no_environments: No environments found. Create your first environment to organize deployments.

contexts.title: Contexts
contexts.description: Manage shareable collections of environment variables. Contexts can be shared across multiple stacks to simplify configuration management.
contexts.no_contexts: No contexts found. Create your first context to share environment variables across stacks.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your Colonia instance and manage your preferences.
settings.general_description: General configuration options will appear here.
